reviews.sentence: Convenient Location with Good Interior Design. It is difficult to find another hotel with better location than Radison Blu Royal Viking in Stockholm. Next to the Central Station with immediate access to the Metro train and Airport Express train. Our worry was the size of the room which few guests had complained. However the interior of the room was well planned. The thin closet functioning mini bar with complimentary coffee tray and safety box were well placed. The work desk with chair and sofa are suitable for multi function. Being a businessman hotel the location does come first with even slightly less generous in space. We stayed for 5 nights and coped with the limited space but also appreciate the well designed room and furnishing. We definite would stay here again if we return to Stockholm.
Exceptional. Excellent location staffs are helpful.

Good value hotel in central location. Right next to the Central Station so handy for the airport but a fairly busy and not particularly attractive location otherwise. Handy enough for the main sights though. Once inside the hotel has everything you need with helpful staff. Good value. Hotel has many rooms so breakfast was rather busy and swarming with people.
Very good. Receptionist was helpful with storage of bags and upgraded us to superior room. Pool was small and crowded overwhelming smell of chlorine.

Location location location. You will not find a hotel better located in Stockholm than this one. You do not even have to leave Central Station after departing the Arlanda Express from the airport to get here. The staff speak better English than native English speakers and everything works just like it should. The perfect hotel in one of the worlds perfect cities.

Changed rooms due to cigarette smells and sewage smell but the third room was beautiful. It was for our honeymoon and they were so kind to welcome us with a nice fruit basket. Its location was very convenient and the staff was very helpful and courteous. The room we finally stayed in was very beautiful as in the advertised picture on the website.

Good. Very centrally located right next to the central station. Comfortable rooms. Good breakfast selection. Most staff helpful. Very good gym and sauna area. lobby cafe sky bar nice to hang out. Lots of attractions within walking distance. Rooms are a bit small for what you pay. Two people with luggage was a squeeze. Area crowded when we checked in due to Europa cup finals. A bit rowdy on match night. Show was inside bath tub. A bit of a climb into tub. Water leaked to toilet floor when showering creating a mess in bath room. Minimal closet space.

Baltic Cruise and extra days in Stockholm. The hotel is right next to Grand Central train station so you can take the Arlanda Express from the airport assuming you can manage your luggage on the train and get off right at the hotel which makes it convenient and more economical in travel. Taxi rides are expensive. The hotel is located in a 5 minute walking distance to old town. Lots of restaurants and coffee shops on the block and in walking distance. The breakfast is a little pricey but it has a lot of variations to offer all of them good. The main issue or inconvenience was or still is the elevator. They have two elevators down and are in the process of being replaced. We were told it takes months to get them delivered and installed. Just allow time for getting the elevator with luggage. The check in staff and front desk were all very friendly and helpful. The skybar has a great view but service is a little slow when crowded. The first floor bar lounge was comfortable and pleasant. Overall our room was god although some in our group had outdated rooms with no air and were compensated on their bill after some persistence with management. When looking for the perfect hotel in the perfect location for the best price do your research.

NICE LOCATION. this hotel is located in the city center most business and shopping are walking distance. central train station is just a stone throw away. recommended for man on the gosmal rooms bed and bathrooms but neat and clean. very small cabinetry and very little space for twin sharing. standard buffet breakfastnice hotel reception and concierge.

Radison Blu Royal Viking Stockholm Sweden. Conveniently located near the Central Train station the staff from reception Skybar and breakfast were all pleasant professional friendly and helpful. The rooms are not huge but are clean and comfortable. We plan to return. Excellent place.

High class wannabe hotel. There are a lot of things to say about this hotel after spending a weekend here but all in all i have to say i m disapointed in many ways. I will try to explain why. First of all the staff is not very serviceminded in my opinion. I feel a bit like i m disturbing them like at the reception when i checked in the lady at the desk was talking to her colegue and not even giving me acknowledge of my existence until she was ready. Annoying. A small nod or a smile would have helped. The car park. they have som sort of consierge service so they just take your car and park it. You sign a receipt but none verify the car for damage. I am not comfortable with that so i chose to photo all of my car before they parked it for me. What definately was not good was that it took 25. minutes for them to fetch my car when i checked out. The breakfast. it was good and what you expect from a hotel like this. What i did nt like was that the scrambled eggs were made from powder the bacon was more or less boiled useless tools in the cereal bags and very crowded in rush hour. The logistics of the breakfast was not very well thought through meaning everybody was walking aroung. and when its hundreds of people there. I guess you get the picture. The rooms and the beds were good nice and clean. And I have to give credit to the cleaning staff they really were service minded and smiling whenever you met them. The best thing about this hotel is the location its dead center of the city right next to the central station. Very good starting point for any activity. So if we come back a weekend to Stockholm this hotel will be on the list of hotels we could stay at but not at the very top of that list.

Good. Polite efficient people. Central location. Great breakfast. Clean rather large room. Good gym. Swimming pool. Elevators were slow. One out of three was always of2 out of 8 front desk people i met could be more friendly. 6 out of 8 were great though.

The pool is very small not really a pool you can swim in. It also belongs to an adjacent SATS gym not really hotels own pool and it was always too crowded. The cleaning in the hotel is bad. I noticed on the 4th night that the sheets was not changed and only the bed was made with the same old sheets. Also in one of the days the bathtub was not even rinsed let alone properly cleaned. The service was poor too. Sometiemes when I called the receprion no one picked up until I gave up. Once when I called to get bathrobe in the room they told me they are out of robes and that I should call the day after. Not a 45 star hotel. Will not stay there and do not recommend it to others either.
So so good location ， very close to Arlanda express. Smell of decoration room is not been fully cleaned some nuts on the desk. Telelphone cable tight on the chair make chair not usable.

Disappointing rude staff. The location was very good. Advertised a pool and sauna but these closed at 3 pm when we were there. There was no way of knowing this as far as I could tell and it spoiled our plans. It was a hot weekend and we had planned to walk get hot then use the spa. Not open. When I asked about it the guy on reception was very sarcastic and rude to me. No customer service whatsoever. Very disappointing.

Disappointed with service. Most staff very unfriendly. No recogirecog of loyalty card and generally poor service. Checking in was terrible Name ID Do you want to pay more to get breakfast. your key were the ONLY words spoken during check in. Where was welcome thanks your room is 703 it is on the 7th floor. thanks for being a member of rewards. Checking out was a very similar experience very few words spoken not even thank you and how was your stay. This hotel really really needs to retrain their reception staff.

A Radison who dressed up. Cosmetically it is a lift with an elegant lobby a special upgrade of the restaurant in terms of design. The rooms are updated with an interior that looks to be of a good quality. But a few things feels like the Ëmperors new clothes¨Stil the same problem areas poor climate control is when it is warm outside a little too few staff in the breakfast room which it also received a modern exterior. Reception staff young and helpful but gives an inexperienced impression. The hotel cleaning staff seems to have been completely exchanged since the last time speaking neither Swedish nor English and seems to have been instructed to stay away from talking to guests.

Okay stay. Central hotel near the train station. Quiet room. The process to check in is ridiculous. there is no dedicated line to stand it so while there is probably 5 people at the counter helping people it is a free for all to check in. The desk staff does not care about this since they were not keeping track who was the next to be helped. it was just whomever walked up to be helped is who they helped. Very unprofessional for a huge hotel like this. And to the guy who checked me in he also checked in two younger ladies in front of me and it was clear that he was flirting with them. Seriously. Be professional. No view if you are placed in a room that overlooks the breakfast buffet. unles you are counting that as your view.

I have stayed here for work over many weeks and it is pretty decent but many little annoyances. The TV channels in all different rooms I have had have consistently had issues poor reception resulting in sound cutting out and image being distorted and the hotel have not been able to fix it despite being notified. The reception is very slow and inefficient it is nice to chitchat when there is no queue but when there is a queue it should be kept to an absolute minimum so others are not kept waiting. Several rooms have had issues with sewer smells and so on. Each is a little thing but it adds up. On the plus side the location is great their basement gym is actually AWESOME cooperation with the SATS company free for hotel guests the rooms are fresh and clean and the breakfast buffet is decent.
